actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit an individual to deduct amounts paid by that individual for retirement savings for the benefit of his spouse.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit an individual to deduct amounts paid by that individual for retirement savings for the benefit of his spouse.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit an individual to deduct amounts paid by that individual for retirement savings for the benefit of his spouse.
